subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Zach Loyd and Ricardo Villar scored to help host F.C. Dallas beat the Red Bulls, 2-1, Sunday in the M.L.S. opener for both teams.
snippet: Zach Loyd and Ricardo Villar scored to help host F.C. Dallas beat the Red Bulls, 2-1, Sunday in the M.L.S. opener for both teams.
